repnme.cdata!:
Pakistan - Tenth Industrial Credit and
            Investment Corporation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Tenth Pakistan Industrial Credit and
            Investment Corporation (PICIC) will provide financing of the
            foreign exchange cost of industrial projects carried out by
            private productive enterprises in Pakistan and of the
            foreign cost of a study of Pakistan's textile industry.
